name: Light Of Gallery
description:
Light Of Gallery is brand New Horror Game!
Escape From the Secret Galleries! Travel through the paintings at the request of EvillDoll.
You have to interact Demon Pictures! Only then you can escape.
But you have to be careful about your actions. Monsters can follow you and lead you to death.
Sometimes you may be embarrassed by a wall with a monster.
But do not worry! You have a safety zone to escape.
Take a break from there!
Is the statue blocking your way?
Then, move the stone statue by erasing the demon pictures.
You can find the way.

The EvilDoll in the art hall is very funny and can sometimes surprise you.
But He will help you a lot.
He is neither friend nor enemy, so be careful!Current game states and What to do later.
SinglePlay


Now, You can play only Single Gamemode, But We will be Update Multiplay Gamemode.
The main goal of the single-game mode is to escape the curse of the ArtGallery.
There is one sub-topic we have prepared so far, and we are thinking about Two sub-topics.
Only one sub-topic will be released at Early Access.

In Maze Maps, you must prioritize survival.
The first sub-topics related to time.
In time-themed maps, time is slower and faster. In that situation, you must avoid the monsters and achieve the purpose.
In Arthall, we are going to lead the fear through stories and various interactions.
You will be able to see the EvilDoll at the art hall.

Multiplay Gamemode

We are preparing a multi-game in hide-and-seek format.
Maps and networking systems are already available.
However, we are delaying the release of the multi-game mode for the balance update.

Once all the single modes are ready, we will release multi-game mode.
Maybe after early access.DeveloperWe Are Korean University Students.
This will be our first game, so there are a lot of deficiencies.
But we will continue to update and get feedback. Until the day you enjoy the game.Our first game will be released on Steam at around 2019.03.05. Thanks.
